articles.title: Russian-state hackers exploit Office vulnerability to infect computers - Ars Technica

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Meet Gizmo: a TikTok for interactive, vibe-coded mini apps - TechCrunch
articles.description: Gizmo's app is like a TikTok for vibe-coded mini apps... and it's a lot of fun.
articles.content: Gizmo, a TikTok-like app for vibe-coded mini applications, is offering a new way to create interactive media. The relatively new mobile app from the startup Atma Sciences lets anyone create experienc… [+3600 chars]
